mapper.sql: select f.id,f.title,f.see,f.content,f.time,f.outline,u.nickname,u.avatar_url, coalesce(max(cm.comment_sum),0) as comment_sum, coalesce(count(case when c.collection = 1 then 1 else null end), 0) AS collection from medicine_forum as f left join sys_user as u on f.user_id = u.id left join (select forum_id,count(comment) AS comment_sum from forum_comment group by forum_id) as cm on f.id = cm.forum_id left join forum_collection as c on f.id = c.forum_id
mapper.select:
and f.title like concat('%',#{forum.title},'%')
and u.nickname like concat('%',#{forum.nickname},'%')
group by f.id order by f.time desc
where f.title like concat('%',#{title},'%') group by f.id
